gear.name: freesurfer-recon-all
gear.label: FreeSurfer (v6.0.0): Recon-All
gear.description: This gear takes an anatomical NIfTI file and performs all of the FreeSurfer cortical reconstruction process. Outputs are provided in a zip file and include the entire output directory tree from Recon-All. Configuration options exist for setting the subject ID and for converting outputs to NIfTI, OBJ, and CSV. FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of structural and functional neuroimaging data from cross-sectional or longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Athinoula A. Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging. Please see https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/FreeSurferSoftwareLicense for license information.
gear.author: Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging <freesurfer@nmr.mgh.harvard.edu>

anatomical.description: Anatomical NIfTI file or DICOM archive.
